thread.section_title: First Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing rooms, fantastic staff!
thread.title_full: Amazing rooms, fantastic staff! - Review of First Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Freddy_c_8888
title: Amazing rooms, fantastic staff!
text:
Just got back from a weekend away with my partner and we couldn't give the hotel better reviews. The room was as clean as you could want and had better views of the Eiffel tower then i was expecting. Its location was ideal a nice walk away from the tower and plenty of restaurants around. The metro was right out the front door but don't let this put you off as it wasn't noisy or off-putting and we used it every day and coming home to your door step was priceless at the end of a long days sight seeing.
But what was the best part of the hotel was by far the staff. They were so welcoming and friendly with fantastic advice of visits and food. They gave us 2 dinner suggestions both brilliant and even went the extra mile and booked us a table at a brilliant restaurant by the tower.
we both thank you very much First hotel staff, we had a wonderful stay.
Room 305- 24-26 feb
Room Tip: pay for the view, its worth it. The higher floor the better. See more room tips
